shaders.name: universal-vfx
shaders.properties:
_MainTex("主贴图", 2D) = "white" {}
_MainColor("主颜色", Color) = (1,1,1,1)
_TillingOffset("缩放偏移", Vector) = (1,1,0,0)
[Toggle]_MainTexAR ("R通道为透明通道", Float) = 0.0
[Toggle]_MainTexUVPolar ("极坐标UV", Float) = 0.0
_MainTexUSpeed ("U方向流动", Float) = 0
_MainTexVSpeed ("V方向流动", Float) = 0
[Toggle]_UseAddTex("使用额外贴图", Float) = 0.0
_AddTex("额外贴图", 2D) = "white" {}
_AddColor("额外颜色", Color) = (1,1,1,1)
_AddTexUSpeed ("U方向流动", Float) = 0
_AddTexVSpeed ("V方向流动", Float) = 0
_AddTexPower ("额外贴图锐度", Range(0.0, 10.0)) = 1.0
_AddTexIntensity ("额外贴图亮度", Range(0.0, 10.0)) = 1.0
_DistortTex("扭曲贴图", 2D) = "white" {}
_DistortTexUSpeed ("U方向流动", Float) = 0
_DistortTexVSpeed ("V方向流动", Float) = 0
_DistortIntensity ("扭曲程度", Range(0.0, 1.0)) = 0.0
_MaskTex ("遮罩贴图", 2D) = "white" {}
[Toggle]_MaskTexReverse ("遮罩贴图反转", Float) = 0
[Toggle]_MaskTexAR ("R通道为遮罩通道", Float) = 1
_MaskTexUSpeed ("U方向流动", Float) = 0.0
_MaskTexVSpeed ("V方向流动", Float) = 0.0
_DissolveColor ("溶解颜色", Color) = (1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0)
_DissolveTex ("溶解贴图", 2D) = "white" {}
_DissolveTexPower ("溶解贴图锐度", Range(0.0, 10.0)) = 1.0
_DissolveTexIntensity ("溶解贴图亮度", Range(0.0, 10.0)) = 1.0
_DissolveTexUSpeed ("U方向流动", Float) = 0.0
_DissolveTexVSpeed ("V方向流动", Float) = 0.0
_DissolveIntensity ("溶解程度", Range(0.0, 1.0)) = 0.0
_DissolveWide ("溶解宽度", Range(0.0, 1.0)) = 0.05
